named-query.name: StatusInfoEntity.findExpirationStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM StatusInfoEntity a WHERE a.expirationDate <= :expirationDate ORDER BY a.id.facilityId, a.id.monitorId, a.id.monitorDetailId, a.id.pluginId

named-query.name: MailTemplateInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MailTemplateInfo a ORDER BY a.mailTemplateId

named-query.name: MailTemplateInfoEntity.findAllOrderByMailTemplateId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MailTemplateInfo a ORDER BY a.mailTemplateId

named-query.name: MailTemplateInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MailTemplateInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.mailTemplateId

named-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyRelationInfo a ORDER BY a.id.notifyGroupId, a.id.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.findAllWithoutJob
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyRelationInfo a WHERE NOT(a.id.notifyGroupId LIKE 'JOB_SES_%') AND NOT(a.id.notifyGroupId LIKE 'JOB_MST_%') ORDER BY a.id.notifyGroupId, a.id.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.findByNotifyGroupId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyRelationInfo a WHERE a.id.notifyGroupId = :notifyGroupId ORDER BY a.id.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.findByNotifyId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyRelationInfo a WHERE a.id.notifyId = :notifyId ORDER BY a.id.notifyGroupId

named-query.name: NotifyRelationInfoEntity.deleteByNotifyGroupId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM NotifyRelationInfo a WHERE a.id.notifyGroupId like :notifyGroupId

named-query.name: NotifyInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyInfo a ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyInfoEntity.findAllOrderByNotifyId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyInfo a ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyInfoEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyInfo a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyHistoryEntity.findByNotifyId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyHistoryEntity a WHERE a.id.notifyId = :notifyId ORDER BY a.id.facilityId, a.id.pluginId, a.id.monitorId, a.id.notifyId, a.id.subKey

named-query.name: NotifyHistoryEntity.findByPluginIdAndMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyHistoryEntity a WHERE a.id.pluginId = :pluginId AND a.id.monitorId = :monitorId

named-query.name: NotifyHistoryEntity.findByPluginIdAndMonitorIdAndFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyHistoryEntity a WHERE a.id.pluginId = :pluginId AND a.id.monitorId = :monitorId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId

named-query.name: NotifyHistoryEntity.deleteAll
named-query.query: DELETE FROM NotifyHistoryEntity a

named-query.name: MonitorStatusEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorStatusEntity a ORDER BY a.id.facilityId, a.id.pluginId, a.id.monitorId, a.id.subKey

named-query.name: MonitorStatusEntity.findByPluginIdAndMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorStatusEntity a WHERE a.id.pluginId = :pluginId AND a.id.monitorId = :monitorId ORDER BY a.id.facilityId, a.id.pluginId, a.id.monitorId, a.id.subKey

named-query.name: MonitorStatusEntity.deleteAll
named-query.query: DELETE FROM MonitorStatusEntity a

named-query.name: NotifyJobInfoEntity.findByJobExecFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyJobInfo a WHERE a.jobExecFacility = :facilityId ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyLogEscalateInfoEntity.findByEscalateFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyLogEscalateInfo a WHERE a.escalateFacility = :facilityId ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: NotifyInfraInfoEntity.findByInfraExecFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NotifyInfraInfo a WHERE a.infraExecFacility = :facilityId ORDER BY a.notifyId

named-query.name: StatusInfoEntity.findByPluginIdAndMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM StatusInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.pluginId = :pluginId AND a.id.monitorId = :monitorId
